item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - Legion.of.Super.Heroes.S01.1080p.HMAX.WEB-DL.DD2.0.x264-Samuel
item.description:
Legion of Super Heroes
Season 1


22 MIN • AL • 2006 • HD

Description
'Legion of Super Heroes' is an animated series starring a young Superman that combines humor with high-stakes, grand-scale super heroics to create the ultimate sci-fi, super hero, wish-fulfillment fantasy for kids of all ages.
Click to expand...
Trailers & Clips

Opening


Superman Meets The Legion
Click to expand...
Accessibility
Audio languages: English (United States), Spanish (Latin American), Portuguese (Brazilian)
Subtitles: English US (SDH)
Click to expand...
More Information
Genres
Animation, Kids, Teen

Runtime
22 min

About This Series
One thousand years from now, Superman, the legendary Man of Steel, will inspire a group of emerging superheroes of the 31st Century to unite to defend the rights of all free worlds and uphold the laws of the United Planets. That is, if they don't kill each other first. 'Legion of Super-Heroes' is an animated series featuring a young Superman that combines humor with high heroism and high stakes to create the ultimate sci-fi, superhero, wish-fulfillment fantasy for kids of all ages. In each episode, Superman and the Legion face threats and adversaries from other worlds who challenge the team as superheroes and emotionally, immersing audiences in both the interpersonal dramas of the characters and the intergalactic challenges.

Cast & Crew
Superman • Yuri Lowenthal
Lightning Lad • Andy Milder
Timber Wolf • Shawn Harrison
Brainiac 5 • Adam Wylie
Phantom Girl • Heather Hogan
Saturn Girl • Kari Whalgren
Bouncing Boy • Michael Cornacchia

Producers
Executive Producer • Sander Schwartz
Producer • James Tucker
Producer • Linda M. Steiner

Directors
Ben Jones
Lauren Montgomery
Tim Maltby

Writers
Amy Wolfram
Matt Wayne
Scott Sonneborn
John Esposito
Rob Hoegee
Marty Isenberg
Stan Berkowitz
Rob Hummel
David Slack

Rating Information
AL
